name: Portgas .D. Ace
text: On Play: Reveal the top 1 card of your deck, you may put into play up to 1 character with the type [Whitebeard Pirates] and a cost of 4 or less. After this, return the remaining cards to the top or bottom of the deck.

effect.text: Reveal the top 1 card of your deck, you may put into play up to 1 character with the type [Whitebeard Pirates] and a cost of 4 or less. After this, return the remaining cards to the top or bottom of the deck.
